item.title: 2.2 Histogram
item.description: Import Libraries import os import sys import math from platform import python_version import cv2 import matplotlib import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np print("Python version : ", python_version()) print("Opencv version : ", cv2.__version__) matplotlib.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (4.0, 4.0) Python version : 3.6.6 Opencv version : 3.4.3 Data load sample_image_path = '../image/' sample_image = 'lena_gray.jpg' img = cv2.imread(sample_image_path + sample_image, cv2.IMREAD_GRAYSCALE) Data description 본 예제에서 사용할 데이터는 아래와 같습니다.
